attributes.action: Allow Chas and Dave to write and perform the theme song for the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel this would make a great change from all the usual themed rubbish you get.  They are London boys and could write a cracking anthem! I'm sure it would be fun-filled with just a touch of irony!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
